mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs_articles_reply(reply_id, article_id, reply_content, status, sort_no, created_user_id, created_at) VALUES (IFNULL(#{replyId}, IFNULL((SELECT reply_id + 1 FROM bbs_articles_reply ORDER BY reply_id DESC limit 1),1)), #{articleId}, #{replyContent}, #{status}, IFNULL((SELECT sort_no + 1 FROM bbs_articles_reply WHERE article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY sort_no DESC limit 1), 1), #{createdUserId}, #{createdAt}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE reply_content = IFNULL(VALUES (reply_content), reply_content) , status = IFNULL(VALUES (status), status)
mapper.select: SELECT reply_id, article_id, reply_content, status, sort_no, created_at, created_user_id, created_at FROM bbs_articles_reply WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
